properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
E
Praise Him praise Him
Jesus our blessed Redeemer
Sing O earth
His wonderful Love proclaim

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Hail Him hail Him
Highest arch-angels In glory
Strength and honor
Give to His holy name

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
Like a shepherd
Jesus will guard His children
In His arms
He carries them All day long

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Praise Him praise Him
Tell of His excellent Greatness
Praise Him praise Him
Ever in joyful song

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Praise Him praise Him
Jesus our blessed Redeemer
For our sins
He suffered and Bled and died

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
He our Rock
Our Hope of eternal Salvation
Hail Him hail Him
Jesus the Crucified

verse.name: v2c
verse.lines:
Sound His praises
Jesus who bore Our sorrows
Love unbounded
Wonderful deep And strong

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Praise Him praise Him
Jesus our blessed Redeemer
Heavenly portals
Loud with hosannahs Ring

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Jesus Savior
Reigneth for ever And ever
Crown Him crown Him
Prophet and Priest And King

verse.name: v3c
verse.lines:
Christ is coming
Over the world victorious
Power and glory
Unto the Lord belong
